statements: DELETE FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE id = 100 AND email_address = 'user@example.com';
DELETE FROM unsubscribe_requests WHERE request_date < '2022-01-01' AND email_address LIKE 'admin%';
DELETE FROM subscription_preferences WHERE email_address = 'example@email.com' AND receive_newsletters = TRUE;
DELETE FROM subscription_history WHERE action = 'unsubscribe' AND date_performed < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM subscription_history WHERE user_id = 1001 AND email_address = 'user1@example.com';
DELETE FROM subscription_history WHERE user_id = 123 AND email_address = 'example1@example.com';
